text: So we've seen how we can use the present to talk about the future in Spanish, using voy a, vamos a, or using some future context, pronto, soon, mañana, tomorrow, la semana que viene, the week that comes, next week.
speaker: Speaker 1

text: But we can also use the present in Spanish to talk about the past, just as we can in English.

text: In English and in Spanish we have three ways to talk about the past, or three main ways to talk about the past.
